Header: 11 GR Troops Join Hands with Jayapuram Civilians
Content: A group of 101 Army personnel of the 11 Gajaba Regiment (GR) of the 651 Brigade under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) joined hands with locals in Jayapuram area and cleaned up the Jayapuram primary medical care unit premises on Friday (14). The community project was launched under the supervision of Brigadier Wasantha Kumarapperuma, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division and the Brigade Commander, 651 Brigade. Troops completed the project within a couple of hours and shared refreshments with participating civilians.
